text: Montargull may refer to: * Montargull (Artesa de Segre), village in the Artesa de Segre municipality, Catalonia * Montargull (La Vansa i Fórnols), in the municipality of la Vansa i Fórnols, Catalonia * Montargull (Llorac), small abandoned village in the municipality of Llorac, Catalonia * Montargull (Avinyonet del Penedès), masia in the municipality of Avinyonet del Penedès, Catalonia
title: Montargull
